titleStmt.title: A generall epistle, and greeting of the Fathers love, to all the saints called and chosen to faithfulness in Christ Iesus ... : and this is to all such as are found worthy to suffer, and is an exhortation to the strengthning of their faith ... : and this is a true testimony of the Father and of the Son ...
titleStmt.author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
